parameters.Description: The system VIEROCLIMA P , with expanded polystyrene insulating panels and leveling organic glue paste , is the historical system , used successfully for over thirty years for the insulation of new buildings , restoration and renovation of the facades of existing buildings . Expanded polystyrene ( EPS ) insulation combining excellent cost-effective to a great ease of processing ; is lightweight , flame-retardant , imputriscibile , perfectly weatherproof .
